text: 4:20 Godɨn Araziba 12:5; 12:11-14; 1 Atriviba 9:3; Onger Akaba 122:1-5En ovaviba me mɨghsɨar kamɨn uari akuvava, Godɨn ziam fe. Ezɨ ia Judaba ghaze, danganir gumazamiziba mangɨva Godɨn ziam fam, a Jerusalemɨn iti.”4:20 Mɨghsɨar amizir kam an gun mɨgeim, a Gerazimɨn Mɨghsɨam, a Samarian Distrighɨn iti. Samarian gumazamiziba mɨghsɨar kamra ghuava Godɨn ziam fe. Nɨ deragh foghsɨ, Luk 9:53ɨn vezɨn itir akamɨn gan.
